quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people.
A person is not given integrity. It results from the relentless pursuit of honesty at all times.
Nothing more completely baffles one who is full of tricks and duplicity than straight forward and simple integrity in another.
Integrity is not something that you should have to think about...nor consider doing...but something in the heart that is already done.
If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
You have the right to remain silent, but you can never repeat, never lie or shade the truth.
You are already of consequence in the world if you are known as a man of strict integrity.
Keep true, never be ashamed of doing right, decide on what you think is right and stick to it.
Men acquire a particular quality by constantly acting in a particular way.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
He is not wise to me who is wise in words only, but he who is wise in deeds.
Power is actualized only when word and deed have not parted company.
We should often feel ashamed of our best actions if the world could see all the motives which produced them.
The true perfection of man lies not in what man has, but in what man is.
Integrity is so perishable in the summer months of success.
Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
Perhaps the surest test of an individual's integrity is his refusal to do or say anything that would damage his self-respect.

Your reputation and integrity are everything. Follow through on what you say you're going to do. Your credibility can only be built over time, and it is built from the history of your words and actions.
Character is what you are in the dark.
To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
To thine own self be true, and it must follow, as the night the day, thou canst not then be false to any man.
The integrity of men is to be measured by their conduct, not by their professions.
Once you get rid of integrity the rest is a piece of cake.
Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. There are too many people who think that the only thing that's right is to get by; and the only thing that's wrong is to get caught.
In silence man can most readily preserve his integrity.
Integrity is not a 90 percent thing, not a 95 percent thing; either you have it or you don't.
Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
The slow man with integrity will ultimately catch the swift one who has none.
If you believe in unlimited quality and act in all your business dealings with total integrity, the rest will take care of itself.
A life lived with integrity even if it lacks the trappings of fame and fortune is a shining star in whose light others may follow in the years to come.

Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather. It is your inner image of yourself, and if you look in there and see a man who won't cheat, then you know he never will.
Integrity is the first step to true greatness.
In great matters men show themselves as they wish to be seen; in small matters, as they are.
There is always room for those who can be relied upon to deliver the goods when they say they will.
There is no better test of a man's integrity than his behavior when he is wrong.
People who fight fire with fire end up with only the ashes of their own integrity.
There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
Courage combined with integrity is the foundation of character.
That you may retain your self-respect, it is better to displease the people by doing what you know is right, than to temporarily please them by doing what you know is wrong.
It takes less time to do a thing right than to explain why you did it wrong.
Like integrity, love of life was not a subject to be studied, it was a contagion to be caught. And you had to catch it from someone who had it.
Truthfulness is the main element of character.
Integrity is what we do, what we say, and what we say we do.
If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it.
A man should be upright, not be kept upright.
Integrity has no need of rules.
The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
Never "for the sake of peace and quiet" deny your own experience or convictions.

Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity. The greatest problem with communication is we don’t listen to understand. We listen to reply. When we listen with curiosity, we don’t listen with the intent to reply. We listen for what’s behind the words.

Living with integrity means: Not settling for less than what you know you deserve in your relationships. Asking for what you want and need from others. Speaking your truth, even though it might create conflict or tension. Behaving in ways that are in harmony with your personal values. Making choices based on what you believe, and not what others believe.
Don't assume, ask. Be kind. Tell the truth. Don't say anything you can't stand behind fully. Have integrity. Tell people how you feel.
Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, and doing as you say you would do.
Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea.
Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
Your integrity determines your destiny.
Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
Some say if you want success surround yourself with successful people. I say if you want true and lasting success surround yourself with people of integrity.

The person of superior integrity does not insist upon his integrity. For this reason, he has integrity. The person of inferior integrity never loses sight of his integrity. For this reason, he lacks integrity.
A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
Only a man of integrity can possess the virtue of honesty, since only the faking of one’s consciousness can permit the faking of existence.
Who you are in public is a test of your conviction; who you are in private, integrity.
Her strength was in the integrity of her actions; she never compromised what she believed she ought to do.
Integrity is congruence between what you know, what you profess, and what you do.
A few people of integrity can go a long way.
A leader with integrity, one who says what they mean, keeps their word and does not lie to their people.
Integrity is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake your consciousness, just as honesty is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake existence.
Don’t ever stray from yourself, in order to be close to someone that doesn’t have the courtesy to remind you of your worth, or the integrity of a gentleman to walk you home.
There is no such thing as a minor lapse of integrity
Truth and integrity must be so rare these days that it confuses people when they hear it.
Aesthetics of integrity. For every star in the sky someone is holding his ground.
Living a life of integrity is one of the greatest missions we can undertake.
Your integrity is sacrosanct. It is who you are. Never let anyone step on your integrity - that's absolutely where you must stand solid.
A life of integrity is a life of stability.
it is easier to work on your integrity when no one knows you than to start working on it when you are at the top.
Do not give up on your idealism and integrity.
Don’t trade in your integrity for influence.
Character is holding to our integrity when everyone around us is holding on to everything except their integrity and pressing us to do the same.
True integrity holds its ground even when such a stance means that you have let go of everything else that’s sitting on that ground.
A person's behavior reflects nothing but the mirror of an aura he/she brought up in. Never doubt their integrity because of their insecurities.
From the crucible of courage, perseverance, and integrity comes triumph.
We can test the substance of our own integrity and love when we witness what flows from our hearts when someone disagrees.
Those who are busy can’t think clearly and honestly. Those who go slow let the truth come to them and lives in integrity.
Your integrity, your dignity, your honor - they aren't for sale. Not ever. Not to anyone.
You already hold the most valuable possession you will ever own, your integrity.
Undeniable integrity is the absolute supreme quality. Without it, no genuine accomplishment is attainable.
People with integrity expect to be believed. If not, they let time prove them right.
The soul will remain faithful to its integrity forever. The spirit does not betray.
Honesty creates integrity. Integrity creates inner peace.
Integrity is not a laughing matter but a serious issue, If a man cannot account for how a dollar committed to his hands was spent, don't expect he will be able to account for a million dollar.
Remain calm even in the mist of mistrust and accusations. Your integrity and track records will surely speak for you.
Integrity means that if our private life was suddenly exposed, we'd have no reason to be ashamed and embarrassed.
Integrity means our outward life is consistent with our inner convictions.
Integrity is the glue that holds our way of life together.
Integrity means a person is the same on the inside as he or she claims to be on the outside.
A man of integrity can be trusted.
Being pure in conduct also includes honesty and integrity in dealing with our fellowmen.
When we live by the truth, we possess integrity.
Integrity means that we are trustworthy and dependable, and our character is above approach.
I believe integrity can be restored to a society one person at a time. The choice belongs to each of us.
Integrity is what you feel.
Integrity is determined behavior.

The key to integrity is to determine a sense of inner directedness that does not yield to the pressures of the age, that identifies with the highest rather than the lowest, the best rather than the worst, the ideal rather than the average, the excellent rather than mediocre.
Integrity is a lifestyle characterized by the indwelling of God's word.
A person who has integrity is neither self-deceived nor self-divided.
The real bond of integrity is religious in character, for religion indicates the oneness of the world of humanity.
Having integrity in some way contributes to the wholeness or completeness of a person and leads to consistency in thought and action over time.
Integrity is the basis of trust.
Integrity in turn creates the trust that we need for ordinary social and political intercourse.
The concept of integrity is about needing wholeness of character.
He who walks with integrity walks securely.
Once you loose your integrity, you can never get it back.
Integrity has no sliding scale. You either have it or you don't.
Integrity was very important.
Having integrity means more to us than simply the absence of deception.
When your character and reputation are the same, you are a person of integrity.
The word integrity means 'oneness'. A person's words, thoughts, and actions are one.
There are a lot of things in life over which we have no control; however integrity is one area over which each of us has 100% control.
To keep one's own integrity, be merciful and uncorrupted and not wish for evil; and not be duped.
Integrity is wholeness, the greatest beauty is.
Fought like an indefatigable soldier; when the question arose of defending your persona your true integrity.
They have strange quiet, integrity, health, soundness, to the full. They've dealt with life and been tempered by it.
Nothing sidelining it; not even the most obfuscated ingredient of royalty attempting to devour its altruistically brilliant and impregnably sparkling integrity.
